definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to take things as they are (idiom)/to leave a situation as it is/to be happy with the status quo

sentences.english: Attainable-Realistic means uninspiring and status quo.
sentences.chinese: 現實性意味着沒那麼刺激與安於現狀。

sentences.english: Until recently, I was reconciled, more or less, to being mediocre for life.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，我才或多或少地安於這種平庸的生活。

sentences.english: That is a poverty of aspiration.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個安於貧窮的打算。

sentences.english: Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown.
sentences.chinese: 戴王冠的頭是不能安於他的枕蓆的。

sentences.english: Don't settle for a half-developed gift.
sentences.chinese: 不要安於半發展的恩賜，要竭力進取學習。

sentences.english: The so-called happiness is to recognize your own limits and to the limit.
sentences.chinese: 所謂幸福，就是認清自己的極限並安於這個極限。

sentences.english: Next to our memories, and pale hems of the masters' gown.
sentences.chinese: 偏安於我們的記憶之側，偏安於賢哲長袍退色的下襬。

sentences.english: Next to our memories, and pale hems of the masters' gown.
sentences.chinese: 偏安於我們的記憶之側，偏安於賢哲長袍退色的下襬。

sentences.english: I have long since come to terms with my blindness.
sentences.chinese: 我早就安於自己的失明瞭。

sentences.english: They never seem content with their present situation.
sentences.chinese: 他們似乎從不安於現狀。

sentences.english: A born warrior couldn't stay working as a smalltime enforcer for long.
sentences.chinese: 一個天生的勇士不可能長時間安於做一個小嘍羅。

sentences.english: But I have always been a free spirit.
sentences.chinese: 但我一直安於自由自在。

sentences.english: But Gemini bosses are never satisfied with the status quo.
sentences.chinese: 但雙子座的上司從不安於現狀。
